front.title: A Control Framework for Unified Optical Networks and AI Computing Orchestration (UONACO)

abstract.t: This document presents the control framework for Unified Optical Networks and AI Computing Orchestration (UONACO). Specifically, it defines the AI computing service model over wide-area networks, outlines the UONACO control architecture, identifies a set of UONACO components and interfaces, and describes their interactions.
